snippet: Among those killed in the American attack in Nangarhar Province were two senior Pakistani militants who had allied themselves with the Islamic State.
abstract: American drone strike in eastern Afghanistan kills two senior Pakistani militants who pledged allegiance to Islamic State.

byline.contributor: Ahmad Shakib contributed reporting from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: Among those killed in the American attack in Nangarhar Province were two senior Pakistani militants who had allied themselves with the Islamic State.

headline.main: ISIS Leaders Reported Killed in Drone Strike in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Drone Strike Kills 2 Pakistanis Tied to ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
